metadata.name: #01 - Panther
metadata.description:
M-35 PANTHER seated on the Mecha base. Ready for launch, to soar above all meta species. 

Inspired by the F-35 Lightning II fighter jet, and a touch of Top Gun, the PANTHER is a brand new centrepiece of the MechaMiniX's Mega Mecha family. 

The latest generation of autonomous galaxy fighter. A mono-cockpit Mecha pilot with the most lethal advantage, avant grade technology, combat-ready fighter amongst the stars, allowing the Mecha to finish its mission and come home safe.

The PANTHER is made during a times of fighting adversity, hoping for the strength to continue on this creator path, going above and beyond.

3D Render, post production in Premiere Pro
[1920 px] 1 : 1 Resolution
14 seconds Turntable Loop
